com.jct.bd.gettexidriver.model.datasource

Class FireBase_DB_manager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.jct.bd.gettexidriver.model.datasource.FireBase_DB_manager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.jct.bd.gettexidriver.model.backend.IDB_Backend

    public class FireBase_DB_manager
extends java.lang.Object
implements com.jct.bd.gettexidriver.model.backend.IDB_Backend

    funcs on backend with connect to firebase

    The FireBase_DB_manager program implements an application that add drive to firebase and get two list of rides and drivers and also alot of funcs on the list that return more specific lists the output on the screen.
    Since:
    2019-01-23
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    David Elkayam
